name: Seeing Runner
description:
A arcade to the 8-bit style where you follow to a person while dodge rubbish and don´t discover you.

Collect all the skins, get all the archivements and enjoy in this game with absurd situation.

  • More of 40 current different skins.
  • 1 current minigame added.
  • More velocity of the gameplay with the step of time.
  • Interface simple.

For anything contact e-mail: contact@bluekeysuika.com
